Name: Drop It Sulfite & Tannin Reducer for Wine, 100% Natural
Details: Stop wine headaches. No preservatives. Why Choose Drop It: Some products on the market treat only sulfites in wines for headaches. However, Drop It also binds to the tannins in wine which are also suspected to cause headaches. Tannins in young wines can cause an astringency or the tactile drying sensation and sense of bitterness they can leave in the mouth. Drop It will slightly smooth out the astringency while not changing the taste of the wine.,• Natural,• No Preservatives/No Artificial Preservatives,• No Artificial Sweeteners,• No Artificial Flavors,• No Artificial Colors,• Soy Free,• Gluten Free
Ingredients: Food Grade Hydrogen Peroxide, Natural Powdered Eggwhites Sunflower Lecithin.
Directions: Directions for Use: Shake lightly before each use and squeeze slightly in upright position to clear tip. Glass (6 oz) white 1-2 drops, Red 2-3 drops into the glass and swirl for 20 seconds. Bottle (770 ml) white 5-8 drops, Red 6-9 drops into the bottle. Re-cork the bottle and turn bottle upside down 2 times. Amounts of drops can be adjusted up to 4 drops for personal use. Keep out of direct sunlight or high heat. Each bottle contains 10 ml. Treats 45-55 glasses of wine. Treats 7-9 bottles of wine.
